date: "10/22/2021"
output: html_document
---


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(here)
library (plyr)
library(data.table)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
library(R.matlab)

## Sets R not to use scientific notations
options(scipen=999) 
```

## Read data
```{r}

ctd_coor_raw <- readMat(here::here("6.raw_data/Koweek_et_al_Offshore_CTD_cast_coordinates.mat"))

```


## Convert to DF
```{r}


df <- ctd_coor_raw %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  rename(lon = "Offshore.CTD.Lon",
         lat = "Offshore.CTD.Lat") %>% 
  mutate(ctd_num = paste0("offshore_ctd ", 1:7)) %>% 
  select(ctd_num, lat, lon)


```


## Save data

```{r}

write_csv(df, here::here("7.clean_data/2012_Koweek_et_al_offshore_ctd_cast_coords.csv"))

```
